sentences.en: Beckham wore a fetching outfit in purple and green.
sentences.cn: 贝克汉姆穿了一件抢眼的紫绿两色套装。

sentences.en: Caroline was trying on one outfit after another.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳一套接一套地试穿衣服。

sentences.en: Dress neatly and attractively in an outfit appropriate to the job.
sentences.cn: 着装要整洁美观，适合于这份工作。

sentences.en: He wore an outlandish outfit of pink pants and green sneakers.
sentences.cn: 他穿了一套稀奇古怪的衣装,粉红色裤子、绿色旅游鞋.

sentences.en: He works for a private security outfit.
sentences.cn: 他在一家私人保安公司工作。

sentences.en: He works in a small publishing outfit.
sentences.cn: 他在一家小型出版单位工作.

sentences.en: She bought a new outfit for the party.
sentences.cn: 她为了这次派对买了套新衣服。

sentences.en: She could change into a different outfit in two minutes.
sentences.cn: 她能在两分钟内换上一套不同的行头。

sentences.en: She was wearing an expensive new outfit.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一身昂贵的新衣裳。

sentences.en: She was wearing an outfit she'd bought the previous day.
sentences.cn: 她穿着前一天买的那套衣服。

sentences.en: The revamp includes replacing the old navy uniform with a crisp blue and white cotton outfit.
sentences.cn: 这项改进包括用清新的蓝白棉套装取代旧的海军制服。

sentences.en: The whole outfit matches up beautifully.
sentences.cn: 整套衣服搭配得很好看.

sentences.en: This company employs more people than any other outfit in the city.
sentences.cn: 这家公司雇用的人员多于市里任何机构.

sentences.en: We are a professional outfit and we do require payment for our services.
sentences.cn: 我们是一家专业机构，对所提供服务确实要收取费用。
哟，卡尔，这身行头很不错嘛！

sentences.en: You don't have to match your lipstick exactly to your outfit.
sentences.cn: 你不一定非要让唇膏的颜色同礼服完全搭配。

words.tran_cn: [贸易] 旅行用品商；运动用具商；[贸易] 装饰用品商店；机器安装工

trans.tran_cn: 全套装备，一套服装，集体，组织
trans.tran_en: a set of clothes worn together, especially for a special occasion
to provide someone or something with a set of clothes or equipment, especially ones that are needed for a particular purpose

trans.tran_cn: 装备，配置设备，供给服装
